description: The handsome youngest son of the Zabi family, dashing Garma is Degwin`s favorite and the darling of Zeon`s citizens. Garma is the nominal commander of Zeon`s Earth Attack Force, which controls two-thirds of the planet`s surface. Given his youth and inexperience, it`s clear Garma owes his position to his family`s favour, and he is desperate to prove himself worthy of it. When his military-academy buddy Char Aznable drives the White Base into his territory, Garma is easily persuaded to risk his life in pursuit of this grand trophy.
name: Garma Zabi
